revision.text:
====EVs Gain==== Different methods of catching a Pokémon will give different amounts of EVs. If the [[Challenge Mode|Slow EVs Challenge Mode]] is activated, you gain 10x less EVs.
''Note: Shiny caught Pokémon gain 5x more EVs than listed below.'' {| class="wikitable" ! EVs gained || Slow EV Challenge || Catching Method |- | 0.1 || 0.01 || Route Pokémon |- | 0.2 || 0.02 || Dungeon Pokémon |- | 1 || 0.1 || Evolution Item |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
